=== NEWS ARTICLE ===
Title: Sensex, Nifty extend gains to 3rd day, Q4 results to guide stock-specific action
Source: Moneycontrol - Markets
Published: 2024-04-23 04:15
Related Stocks: LT
Categories: markets

Summary:
India VIX, which measures near-term volatility saw a sharp fall of 18 percent to trade around 10.42

Sentiment: neutral
